page.title: 04Netball
page.content: We started playing netball at our school at about Autumn.There are seven in our team and their names are Margret,Heidi,Jennifer,Claire,Alison and Diane.We have got a netball pitch marked out.We have only had two games. Our first game was with Bridekirk. They beat us easily by 9-3.But we didn't expect to win in our first game anyway.They came to our school that time.After our first game we knew the main rules of the game.Our second game we played Eaglesfield.We played a bit better with Eaglesfield but they still beat us quite easily,that time we went to their school the score was 11-4. We haven't had any games with any other schools recently. BY CLAIRE DAVIDSON
